cards.itemDesc: This five-foot long ardite greatsword has a narrow blade and a hilt of wrought iron wrapped in grey leather. The blade is warm to the touch and shimmers with brilliant red and orange hues.
These dark metal gauntlets were forged using fire from the heart of a salamander.

cards.itemName: Nimbus, First Staff of the Thunderbirds
cards.itemDesc: This ancient staff was created when a piece of driftwood was struck by lightning, fusing it to a twisted length of glass made from the sand on which it laid.
A rigid stone wand used by the arcane dwarves of the Direstone mines.
This fist-sized sapphire vibrates and hums with positive psionic charge.
This heavy ring is made from polished granite and set with pale red quartz.
A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written in a mystical cipher.
Whatever its potency, the potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated..
